mapper.select: select m.movie_seq, m.title, m.poster, m.stillshot, m.openingday, ceil((m.openingday-sysdate)) "dday", (select round(avg(star),2) from review where movie_seq=m.movie_seq ) "starratio" from movie m where m.closingday > sysdate order by openingday desc
select * from previewmovie order by premovie_seq desc

select r.title, (select m.poster from movie m where m.title=r.title ) "poster", (select m.stillshot from movie m where m.title=r.title ) "stillshot", (select m.openingday from movie m where m.title=r.title ) "openingday", lpad(to_char(sum(r.peoplenum),'999999'),10,' ') "peoplenum", round(ratio_to_report(sum(r.peoplenum)) over(partition by GROUPING_ID(r.title))*100,2) "ratio", (select round(avg(star),2) from review where movie_seq=(select m.movie_seq from movie m where m.title=r.title ) ) "starratio" from reserve r where userid in (select userid from members where birthday between TO_DATE('19850101', 'YYYYMMDD') and TO_DATE('19951231', 'YYYYMMDD') intersect select userid from reserve ) and title in (select title from movie where closingday > sysdate intersect select title from reserve ) group by r.title order by "ratio" desc
